'''Vrath''' is an [[Orcs of Mordor|Orc of the Southlands]] who is stabbed and beheaded by [[Arondir]]. Vrath was invented by [[Amazon Studios]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', where he is portrayed by [[Jed Brophy]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7631058/characters/nm0112400|articlename=Jed Brophy: Vrath|dated=|website=IMDb|accessed=10 September 2022}}</ref>
